messages.subject: Re: Not Back to School!
messages.msgSnippet: ... I found myself walking down the school supplies aisle today and caught myself mid sentence exclaiming to my 3year old, Oh, look at all the ...art...
messages.messageBody:
>Donna writes:
> No, we're not going back to school, but we did go
>shopping today

I found myself walking down the 'school supplies'
aisle today and caught myself mid sentence exclaiming
to my 3year old, "Oh, look at all the ...art...
supplies". I didn't know what else to call them; and,
I didn't feel the need to introduce the concept of
'school supplies' to him.

There's a vignette in my son's new Little Bill video
where Bill Cosby is psyching kids up for going to
kindergarten when they are 5. I wish I could have
deleted that from the video *cringe*. It's actually
pretty cute except for the kindergarten part.

-Jennefer
